description: Giant hyssop (Agastache cana 'Sinning' SONORAN SUNSET) is an amazing plant to have in your garden. It is drought-tolerant, deer-resistant and blooms for many months throughout the summer with long-lasting lavender-pink flower spikes. It also produces fragrant foliage that can be used to make a tea, adding invigorating aromas to your garden. Its woody stems and sturdy structure make it easy to shape and a great addition to any border. Its range of colors also makes it an eye-catching feature in full sun areas, making it an incredibly attractive choice for any garden.
